item.title: China’s earnings season is underway. Here's who’s benefiting from AI
item.description: China's artificial intelligence-related growth is giving corporate earnings a lift, according to UBS.

item.title: Too early to bet against AI trade, State Street suggests
item.description: State Street' Anna Paglia is reiterating her bullish stance on artificial intelligence stocks despite the Nasdaq’s worst week since April.

item.title: Low-cost ETFs in 401(k) retirement plan? Fund giant State Street says you may soon see something like it
item.description: State Street SPDR ETFs are coming to 401(k) market in new low-cost, economies of scale challenge to the mutual fund status quo that dominates retireme...

item.title: Fed's Miran says stablecoin surge could help push interest rates lower
item.description: The central banker said the Fed might need to lower its own policy rate to avoid unintentionally slowing the economy.

item.title: Altimeter's Brad Gerstner says market pullback is healthy, sees no bubble in tech
item.description: Gerstner pushed back on the idea that the market is in bubble territory.
